channel.title: Pk-legacy Beta | Spawn & Pk | 24 skills | Uptime 24/7
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5206676/adrians_small_penis.png[/img][/center]
[center][size=18pt][i]Pk-Legacy is current under its first and only beta stage and will be under this beta stage for 2 weeks. After the beta all character files will be reset and prepared for the full release of the server. We hope to see all of you checking out Pk-Legacy and hope you all enjoy your stay on the server. -Pk-Legacy Staff[/i][/size][/center]
[size=18pt][center][color=blue]Server Links Server forums - [url=http://pk-legacy.boards.net/]http://pk-legacy.boards.net/[/url] Server Download - https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/390061856/Pk-Legacy%20Beta.jar

item.title: Pk-legacy Beta | Spawn & Pk | 24 skills | Uptime 24/7
item.dc:creator: @beale beale
item.description:
@beale wrote:

[quote=“paulvereline, post:1, topic:553341”][center][/center]

[center][size=18pt]Pk-Legacy is current under its first and only beta stage and will be under this beta stage for 2 weeks. After the beta all character files will be reset and prepared for the full release of the server. We hope to see all of you checking out Pk-Legacy and hope you all enjoy your stay on the server. -Pk-Legacy Staff[/size][/center]

[size=18pt][center][color=blue]Server Links
Server forums - http://pk-legacy.boards.net/
Server Download - https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/390061856/Pk-Legacy%20Beta.jar[/quote]

Hey everyone ~ Official owner of PK-Legacy here. We will be under Beta testing for approximately 2 weeks. (Maybe more if needed) This is just a time to find and improve the final bugs of the server so that the official release will be best. Keep in mind, the current forums is just temporary for the beta stage. Upon the official release, we will have a domain and better forums. (We will be adding auto-vote and possible high scores) I hope everyone is excited with their stay on PK-Legacy and anyone can come to me about any problems @ my skype. (clifton.beale) Alternatively, you can talk to Paul or Adrian In game. [I will not be very active myself during Beta]

Kind Regards

Read full topic
